What are the steps to set up and launch the Verus wallet on your computer?

To set up and launch the Verus wallet on your computer, follow these steps:

**Step 1: Download the Verus wallet**
First, download the Verus wallet from the official Verus website. Make sure to download the correct version for your operating system.

**Step 2: Unzip the folder**
Unzip the compressed folder to a location on your computer where you can easily access it, such as your Desktop. It's a good idea to rename the folder to "Verus vX.x" where "X.x" is the version number, so you can keep track of which version you're running.

**Step 3: Launch the Agama app**
Launch the Agama app, which is located within the unzipped folder. When you open the app, you'll see a startup screen. On this screen, select "VRSC" from the dropdown menu under "Lite (SPV) Mode", and then choose "Create new wallet". This will guide you through the process of setting up a new Verus wallet.

By following these steps, you'll be able to set up and launch the Verus wallet on your computer, and start using it to manage your Verus coins.
